growthexperiments-help-panel-tog-help-pa: [[Special:Preferences]], tab 'Edit'. Allows user to enable and disable experimental Help Panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-cta-button-: Text to display in a button which loads the help panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-bu: Text to display in the button for asking a question in the help panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-submit-ques: Text to display in the button for submitting a question via the help panel. {{Gender}}
growthexperiments-help-panel-editing-hel: Header for a list of help links in the help panel.
Link in the help panel to view more help content.
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-wi: Header for feature that allows users to post questions to their wiki's help desk
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-pl: Placeholder text for the area to ask a question in the help panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-back-home: Text to show on button that takes user to home screen of help panel
growthexperiments-help-panel-close: Text shown on a button to close the help panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-home-title: Title shown at top of help panel.
growthexperiments-help-panel-questionrev: Title shown at top of help panel when a user reviews their question before submitting.
Text to show in the help panel when a user is submitting their question.
Label for a field displaying the user's username in the help panel.
Label for a field displaying the user's email in the help panel.
Note to display to user that they will be emailed when someone replies to them
Label to show above the are where a user may write a question in the help panel.
Label for a checkbox in the help panel where a user decides whether the title of the article they are working on should be included in the header of their help desk question.
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-su: Template to use for questions posted to community help desk via the help panel. $1 is the username and $2 is the optional wiki Title.
growthexperiments-help-panel-question-po: Error to show to user if posting question fails. $1 is a link to the community help desk
growthexperiments-help-panel-questioncom: Title shown at top of help panel after submitting a question.
Header shown at the top of help panel after submitting a question.
Confirmation text to the user that their question was posted successfully through the help panel.
Confirmation to the user that they will receive an email notification when a response is posted.
Text to display with the link to the question the user posted through the help panel.
Text to display with the More about this feature link
